original_text: If your right eye leads you to do wrong things, then you should take it out. You should throw it away. Yes, you will lose one eye. But it will be much worse if you keep your whole body and God throws you into hell.
korean_text: 만일 네 오른 눈이 너로 실족하게 하거든 빼어 내버리라 네 백체 중 하나가 없어지고 온 몸이 지옥에 던져지지 않는 것이 유익하며

sentences.original_text: If your right eye leads you to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너의 오른쪽 눈이 너를 잘못된 일로 이끈다면

sentences.original_text: then you should take it out
Yes, you will lose one eye
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 너는 한 눈을 잃을 것이다

sentences.original_text: But it will be much worse
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 훨씬 더 나쁠 것이다

sentences.original_text: if you keep your whole body
and God throws you into hell
